item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Dixit Kumar Garg and S Shodasakshari Vidya Schedule: Monday and Thursday, 11:30 – 12:55 Classroom: SH-2 (2nd floor, C-1 Vindhya) Problem sets Problem set 1 (Due: 12.01.2022) Problem set 2 (Due: 05.02.2022) Problem set 3 (Due: 07.03.2022) Lectures Introduction to Randomized algorithms, RandQS Class notes (Includes the list of tentative topics) References: Chapter 1 of [1], Chapter 1 & Section 2.

item.title: Teaching at IIT Bombay
item.description: CS 604 - Combinatorics (Spring 2019) Co instructor with Prof. Sundar Vishwanathan. CS721 - Computational Complexity (Monsoon 2018) Co instructor with Prof. Nutan Limaye.
